title: Drawing, "Frying Pan for General Mi", 1940–50
medium:
ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp in black ink at lower left: eva s. zeisel industrial design/431 RIVERSIDE DRIVE NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite throughout with alphabet and measurements; at lower left: HX-277/GENERAL MILLS, INC. MECH. DIVISION MINNEAPOLIS, MINNESOTA; Designer's stamp: 8 1/2" FRYING PAN

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Frying Pan for General Mi", 1940–50.
1940–50. ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-19.
